Prints a concise comparison report

Source: R/compare.R
print.DAGassist_compare.Rd

Prints a concise comparison report

Usage

# S3 method for class 'DAGassist_compare'
print(x, ...)

Arguments

x

A DAGassist_compare object returned by compare_specs().

...

Ignored.

Value

Invisibly returns x.

Details

Prints the output of compare_specs(), showing validation status, minimal controls, original/minimal formulas, and a compact coefficient formula. may want to clean for kable or latex output later. or could maybe wrap in a capture.output since it uses cat.

Examples

set.seed(1)
d <- dagitty::dagitty("dag { Z -> X; Z -> Y; X -> Y }")
n <- 100
Z <- rnorm(n); X <- 0.8*Z + rnorm(n); Y <- 1.2*X + 0.5*Z + rnorm(n)
df <- data.frame(Y, X, Z)
cmp <- compare_specs(d, Y ~ X + Z, df, exposure = "X", outcome = "Y")
print(cmp)
#> DAGassist compare
#> Validation: VALID
#> 
#> Controls (minimal): {Z}
#> 
#> Formulas:
#>   original: Y ~ X + Z
#>   minimal : Y ~ X + Z
#> 
#> Original fit (coef head):
#>               Estimate Std. Error    t value     Pr(>|t|)
#> (Intercept) 0.02535343  0.1051941  0.2410157 8.100516e-01
#> X           1.14653318  0.1094785 10.4726744 1.282313e-17
#> Z           0.56388362  0.1458822  3.8653355 2.005880e-04
#> 
#> Minimal  fit (coef head):
#>               Estimate Std. Error    t value     Pr(>|t|)
#> (Intercept) 0.02535343  0.1051941  0.2410157 8.100516e-01
#> X           1.14653318  0.1094785 10.4726744 1.282313e-17
#> Z           0.56388362  0.1458822  3.8653355 2.005880e-04
